attributes.action: Legally challenge Leave campaign's lies/false statements in the EU Referendum.
attributes.additional_details:
Immigration: Older voters with more traditional values who may be less tolerant were specifically targeted and lied to about how immigration would improve once we leave the EU. More immigrants arrive in th `uK from outside the EU. Also, immigrants from inside the EU will still get on boats and 'break in' to the UK.

Turkey is not going to allowed into the EU, as the Leave campaigners mentioned.

£350m will NOT be put back into the NHS: http://bit.ly/2906UBD
attributes.background: Many voters, voted for something that they thought was true - but the Leave campaign was full of false statements and lies and so voters have been deceived. If the campaign had been more truthful they would not have won and so this needs challenging legally.

rejection.details:
The courts are responsible for administering the legal system. Any legal challenge would need to be pursued through the courts, which are independent of Government and Parliament. 

If you would like a public inquiry into the referendum campaign, you could sign this petition:

https://petition.parliament.uk/petitions/139525
